title: New free champion rotation: Akali, Azir, Cho'Gath and more!

replies.body:
While playing a blind pick pvp game on summoners rift I found that I could use my w ability on turrets when playing tf. Now I'm not saying it's a bug or anything but I'm not quite sure if that's supposed to be there and i thought i would let you know cuz red carding turrets gives him just a little more pushing power.

BTW: i have no idea how to contact you guys so I'm just using comments
